attributes.action: stop ALL immigration until we have the services to cope
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FIRST and most basic thing for any leader of any country to do is to calculate a population cap for their country based on the ability to house, provide services for and to generally look after their people.
This HAS NOT happened, I have done this for them and have calculated that number as 49 million and since the governments own figures place our population at around 60 million I think the best thing to do is to stop ALL immigration until we have caught up on the housing and services front, and then and only then do we reopen CONTROLLED and selective immigration.
Anything else in my opinion is a dereliction of duty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
